Node.definition: to lift up (one's eye, face); hence: = action by which humans direct their face or eyes away from the ground so that they can see what is in the distance or in the sky

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= the area separating two or mores locations
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which an object is red or reddish in color
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which objects are white in color
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= state in which something is spotted or blotched in color
exact meaning unsure; probably: = pertaining to being covered with spots or patches of a color
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= state in which a countable entity is four in number

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= a group of people who have been forcibly taken from their land to another
= man, also known as Helem (חֵלֶם) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of prophet (נָבִיא) Zechariah (זְכַרְיָה)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ► came from Babylon (בָּבֶל) to Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) after the exile
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ► returned from exile
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man, also known as Hen (חֵן) ◄ son of Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה) ► time of prophet (נָבִיא) Zechariah (זְכַרְיָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) after exile
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= circular or semi circular ornamental headdress, ◄ usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, ► worn by kings, priests, and officials as a symbol of authority and status; also given to women by their suitors to win their affection

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= man, also known as Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) ◄ son of Jehozadak (יְהֹוצָדָק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of exile
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: sprout; hence: = a new member of a royal dynasty, ◄ compared to a new branch that sprouts from a tree
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.gloss: to sprout|to come up|to spring up
Node.definition: = process by which plants, trees, or hairs come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which humans undergo certain processes or actions initiated by (other) humans or deities
= state in which humans, deities, animals and plants are respected by others, implying beauty, vigor and authority
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= the area separating two or mores locations
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= circular or semi circular ornamental headdress, ◄ usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, ► worn by kings, priests, and officials as a symbol of authority and status; also given to women by their suitors to win their affection
= man, also known as Heldai (חֵלֹן) ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of prophet Zechariah (זְכַרְיָה)
= man; ► came from Babylon (בָּבֶל) to Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) after the exile
= man; ► returned from exile
= man, also known as Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) ◄ son of Zephaniah (צְפַנְיָה) ► time of prophet (נָבִיא) Zechariah (זְכַרְיָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= an object that serves as a reminder to humans or deities of things that have happened or need to be done
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
